q1: Are people in Liverpool obsessed with football?
a1: The people of Liverpool are just as obsessed with supporting their team as any other team.
q3: WELCOME TO HELL Liverpool fans face clashes with the ‘world’s most dangerous’ football hooligans when they arrive in Kiev for Champions League final
a4: Liverpool is passionate but not hooligans.
q5: What makes liverpool fans passionate and not hooligans?
a5: These supporters create an atmosphere of passion, not hostility
